mapper.select: SELECT WORKCENTER_ID , NAME , USE_YN , NOTE , MANAGER_ID , ROUTING_ID FROM WORKCENTER

SELECT r.ROUTING_ID AS ROUTING_ID , r.NAME AS NAME , r.USE_YN AS USE_YN , r.ITEM_ID AS ITEM_ID , i.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME , r.NOTE AS NOTE , r.PROCESS_QUANTITY AS PROCESS_QUANTITY , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WORKCENTER WHERE ROUTING_ID = r.ROUTING_ID) AS USED_CNT FROM ROUTING r INNER JOIN ITEM i ON r.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID
SELECT ITEM_ID , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_TYPE , USE_YN FROM ITEM WHERE 1 = 1 AND ITEM_ID NOT IN (SELECT ITEM_ID FROM ROUTING) AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT prm.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER , p.NAME AS NAME , prm.PROCESS_ID AS PROCESS_ID , p.INSPECTION_YN AS INSPECTION_YN , prm.IS_LAST_ORDER AS IS_LAST_ORDER FROM PROCESS_ROUTING_MAPPING prm INNER JOIN PROCESS p ON prm.PROCESS_ID = p.PROCESS_ID WHERE prm.ROUTING_ID = #{routing_id}
